training_quality_justification: Score: 6/10 (BELOW MINIMUM THRESHOLD - BLOCKS PR). Positive: Complex serverless architecture, good security practices, monitoring, proper CDK patterns. Critical Issues: (1) Missing required sample data population feature explicitly requested in PROMPT, (2) MODEL_FAILURES.md claims this was fixed but implementation is absent, (3) Inconsistency between documented fixes and actual code reduces training value. Needs improvement to meet minimum quality threshold of 8/10.
author: veera-turing
